name: Fairytale Loire Valley Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
Stay in your own fairytale Loire Valley château. A magnificent 19th century privately owned château, situated in the heart of the beautiful Loire Valley, France.
The Fairytale Loire Valley Château sits in an estate of 22 acres (9 hectares) of formal gardens, vegetable garden, orchard, woodland and rolling fields and is just a short walk from the picturesque town, on the Loire river between Tours and Angers.
Renovated to a 5 star boutique standard and filled with luxury furnishings chosen by designers in London and Paris, the Château offers double and twin accommodation for up to 18 guests, in 9 individually designed en-suite bedrooms and suites over two floors. The Chateau hosts indoor and outdoor dining areas for you and your guests to enjoy from eating in the central courtyard to the formal dining room inside the chateau. There is a minumum stay of two nights but this will leave you lots of time to enjoy your surroundings.
Offering exclusivity throughout the year, you will enjoy complete and private use of the entire château and grounds during your stay. Welcoming parties up to 60 (or more if you hire a marquee), this superb chateau is perfect for an intimate, unforgettable wedding celebration with family and close friends.
Activities at the Château include an outdoor heatable swimming pool, golf driving range, badminton, disc/frisbee golf, croquet, outdoor table tennis, trampoline, pétanque and inside childrens playroom with table football. The venue also offers a fully equipped gym (air conditioned), selection of bicycles to hire, picturesque nature trails for long walks or a nice jog in the sunny French countryside. This Château is close to many activities, vineyards and large châteaux open to the public for great entertainment for the days either side of your big day.
Exclusive weekly booking rates 2023 based on 5 nights
Low: 8,100€ = Jan - May, Oct - Dec (not Easter, May half term, Christmas or New Year)
Mid: 8,900€ = Easter, June, Sept
High: 10,750€ = May half term, July, Aug, Christmas, New Year
400€ end of stay compulsory cleaning fee
Exclusive weekly booking rates 2024 based on 5 nights
Low: 8,600€ = Jan - May, Oct - Dec (not Easter, May half term, Christmas or New Year)
Mid: 9,400€ = Easter, June, Sept
High: 11,250€ = May half term, July, Aug, Christmas, New Year
400€ end of stay compulsory cleaning fee
We can arrange shorter stays for a minimum of 3 nights during low and mid season - please contact us for details. This Fairytale Venue is available for exclusive bookings throughout the year. You will enjoy complete and private use of the entire château and grounds. Managers live in separate accommodation in the grounds so are always on hand to help.
This Fairytale Loire Valley Château is perfect for weddings, celebrations and special occasions. If you have any further questions about our venue then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to answer any questions.
